Summary: saucer crash seen by prison guards
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hutchinson
There was one other sighting in Hutchinson on or around December 20th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsmy son is in hutchison prison.. he called me tonite and told me tht guards at a near by facility actually observed the crask... and then military presence... saying it was an experimental drone... it was shown on here on a flat bed trailer covered by tarps....
